---
category: news
title: "Face recognition attendance system for VMC sanitary workers"
excerpt: "VIJAYAWADA: With a spike in Covid-19 cases in the city, the Vijayawada Municipal Corporation (VMC) is making use of Face Recognition Software (FRS) developed by the Commissioner and Director of Municipal Administration (CDMA) for registering the attendance details of sanitary workers."
